title: A trve relation of Gods providence in the province of Mvnster in delivering them from the hands of ther enemies and giving them a great victory : related in a letter / sent from a gentleman, a voluntier in the Lord Dungarvans troope to a worthy friend of his in London.
author: Johnson, Thomas, volunteer in the Lord Dungarvan's troope.
publisher: Printed by L. N. for William Ley,
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
